table.name: vtiger_workflowrelevances
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_workflowrelevances` ( `workflowrelevancesid` int(11) NOT NULL, `relmodule` varchar(100) default NULL, `reloperate` varchar(100) default NULL, `relid` varchar(100) default NULL, `workflowstagesid` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`workflowrelevancesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
